item.description:
CT REIA and Alan Cowgill presents: How To Find An Unlimited Supply of Money For Residential and Commercial Properties

September 20 - 5:30 to 9:00 PM Crowne Plaza Hotel. 100 Berlin Road. Cromwell, CT FREE for CTREIA and AOACT members | $30 for guests

CLICK HERE for more information and/or to register for this meeting.

Could You Use An Unlimited Supply Of Money To Do All The Residential And Commercial Deals You Can Find?

At this meeting, Alan Cowgill will show you how you can get all the money you need to buy single-family houses, commercial buildings, apartment complexes, or luxury homes, regardless of your credit or financial situation within 30 days.

You Will Learn
1) How to get all the money you need to buy single-family houses, commercial buildings, apartment complexes, or luxury homes, regardless of your credit or financial situation... within 30 days.

2) Crucial 5 steps to success, so that you can find all the private money you need: Build Credibility, Generate Leads, Secure Private Lenders, Buy/Sell Property, Pay Day

3) How to pre-screen your prospects and the "Magic" words to get them to commit

4) Scripts you should use when talking to people you know, their voicemails, and/or referrals

5) Why these 4 commonly used types of financing can cripple your real estate business and how to stay away from them: Bank, Line of credit, Hard money lender, Creative financing

6) How to do all of this with no monthly payments

About Alan Cowgill
Alan Cowgill started his career as a real estate investor in February of 1995, so he has over 11 years in real estate. Five years ago he went full time as a real estate investor and for the last 4 1/2 years he has done his deals exclusively using private lenders. Alan typically buys 5 houses/month and has bought or sold over 200 properties.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CTREIA Monthly Meeting With Alan Cowgill
